sentences.en: At the required level of visual verisimilitude, computer animation is costly.
sentences.cn: 要使电脑动画的视觉效果达到要求的逼真程度，花费会十分昂贵。

sentences.en: At the required level of visual verisimilitude, computer animation is extremely costly.
sentences.cn: 要使电脑动画的视觉效果达到要求的逼真程度，花费会十分昂贵。

sentences.en: His theory on verisimilitude is a theory on the end of science.
sentences.cn: 逼真性的理论是他关于科学的目的的理论.

sentences.en: questions about the verisimilitude of the document
sentences.cn: 针对这份文件的真实性提出的问题

sentences.en: RESULTSL Three - dimensional data of facial profile was accurate and the images were reconstructed with verisimilitude.
sentences.cn: 结果:面部软组织的三维数据的采集度高,生成的团像逼真.

sentences.en: Stories must have verisimilitude to interest most people.
sentences.cn: 故事必须有逼真的事物让多数人感兴趣.

sentences.en: These flower illustrationsshow the artist's concern for verisimilitude.
sentences.cn: 这些花卉插图表明这个画家很注重写实.

sentences.en: To add verisimilitude, the stage is covered with sand for the desert scenes.
sentences.cn: 为了更加逼真，舞台上铺满了沙子作为沙漠的场景。

words.tran_cn: 逼真，貌似真实；逼真的事物

trans.tran_cn: 逼真，逼真的事物，貌似真实
trans.tran_en: the quality of being true or real
